about_the_game:
Live the tale of a Romanized chieftain uniting his clan on the fringes of the Roman Empire.  In this story-rich kingdom management RPG, lead through narrative events, consolidate resources, and establish alliances.  Beware of every decision as they will haunt you throughout the story.

In the twilight of the Western Roman Empire, you rise as a Romanized barbarian chieftain amidst the rugged landscape of Dalmatia. Tasked with uniting your tribe, the Sciri, you must  navigate a world of shifting alliances and political intrigue.

As the son of a fallen leader and a veteran of the Eastern Roman Army, your journey confronts a difficult choice: uphold the traditions of your ancestors or embrace the allure of Roman civilization. This pivotal decision not only shapes your identity but also determines the fate of your kingdom.

Will you secure your legacy as a barbarian warrior or Roman noble?

  • Turn-based decision making

  • Text-based narrative events

  • Dialogue-based choices and investment of resources

  • Management of a late antique kingdom

  • Navigating politics and factions

Manage Your Life and Legacy - Non-Linear Narrative

  • Be challenged by procedurally generated events based on player choices and kingdom management style

  • Discover how your kingdom will end based on your choices

  • Choose your background story and form who you are.

  • Interact with the world of late Roman politics 

Manage Your Kingdom - Resource & Kingdom Management

  • Choose your upgrade path by deciding who you help

  • Answer requests from factions and cities

  • Engage in diplomacy with your neighboring kingdoms and with internal factions

content_descriptors.notes: Some events may describe violence or warfare.

In the twilight of the Western Roman Empire, you rise as a Romanized barbarian chieftain amidst the rugged landscape of Dalmatia. Tasked with uniting your tribe, the Sciri, you must  navigate a world of shifting alliances and political intrigue.

As the son of a fallen leader and a veteran of the Eastern Roman Army, your journey confronts a difficult choice: uphold the traditions of your ancestors or embrace the allure of Roman civilization. This pivotal decision not only shapes your identity but also determines the fate of your kingdom.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Graphics: Any normal card will do
  • Sound Card: Any normal card will do
  • Additional Notes: It's a pretty simple game with retro graphics
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Graphics: Any normal card will do
  • Sound Card: Any normal card will do
  • Additional Notes: It's a pretty simple game with retro graphics

name: Foederatus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any normal card will do
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any normal card will do
  • Additional Notes: It's a pretty simple game with retro graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any normal card will do
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any normal card will do
  • Additional Notes: It's a pretty simple game with retro graphics

short_description: In this kingdom management RPG, you assume your father’s throne in Dalmatia to lead the kingdom, build alliances, fight rivalries and hear the pleas of your people. On the brink of change, you will define the political order. By your decisions, the future of Dalmatia is in your hands.
